http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif CARE4PHD List CARE4PHD List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=CARE4PHD&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=CARE4PHD.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-02-24T14:18:48Z Blackford, Sarah 2015-02-24T14:18:40+00:00 2015-02-24T14:18:40+00:00 Career professionals' conference update https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CARE4PHD;a4c91817.1502 Dear all,<br><br>The most up to date programme and booking form for the Careers professionals' conference (9th June) are now live on the AGCAS website.<br><br>Warwick University is easily accessible from Birmingham International airport and also from London Euston station (direct trains to Coventry, then bus or taxi to the university campus). Hope to see you there! [...] B\ufffd\ufffdr\ufffd\ufffdnice Kimpe 2015-02-16T15:30:16+01:00 2015-02-16T15:30:16+01:00 CARE workgroup "career" https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CARE4PHD;d6be9a70.1502 Dear all,<br><br>As mentioned in Barbara's message from late December, different worksgroups<br>have been created to steer the next CARE steps. One of them is about career<br>paths for researchers, I'm the one in charge of its coordination. If you<br>want to be active in this workgroup, you're more than welcome!<br><br>You find below a short presentation of its goals and of expected input from<br>the workgroup members. It's only suggestions, feel free to add your ideas!<br>I may create later a document on google drive that we can share to<br>facilitate our cooperation. [...] Tina Persson 2015-02-12T13:05:57+01:00 2015-02-12T13:05:57+01:00 Re: Evaluating guidance https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CARE4PHD;353eca1e.1502 Dear All of you CARE Members!<br><br>This is great information! As I have started to get inmails on LInkedIn<br>from reserachers wanting to buy coaching hours from me and I have so far no<br>coaching contract to mial them. Do you Sarah have any connections that have<br>such a contract? I know coaches having contracts but only in Swedish. It<br>could be good to have a contract used by CARE group for the future. [...] Blackford, Sarah 2015-02-05T20:58:25+00:00 2015-02-05T20:58:25+00:00 Evaluating guidance https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CARE4PHD;f2b8b0f0.1502 Dear CARE members,<br><br>You may have seen Barbara Janssen's message on the LinkedIn group asking for people to share their experience of evaluating their one-to-one guidance interventions. I was able to gather some very valuable information from our career colleagues in AGCAS and am sharing them with you here. I hope this is helpful to anyone considering devising some feedback mechanism in their institution. [...] Blackford, Sarah 2015-01-30T14:44:40+00:00 2015-01-30T14:44:40+00:00 Re: Supporting the Careers of PhD students and researchers - haring knowledge, practice and insights - 9th June 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CARE4PHD;75910f81.1501 Hi B\ufffd\ufffdr\ufffd\ufffdnice,<br><br>Good to hear from you and sorry to hear you won't be able to make it to the meeting in June. As far as I know, the notes from the meeting will be made available on the AGCAS website at the discretion of the speakers. Having said that, bear in mind we are formulating a mainly discursive, interactive networking format, which will limit the amount of notes and materials available after the meeting. [...] B\ufffd\ufffdr\ufffd\ufffdnice Kimpe 2015-01-29T19:44:58+01:00 2015-01-29T19:44:58+01:00 Re: Supporting the Careers of PhD students and researchers - haring knowledge, practice and insights - 9th June 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CARE4PHD;76520469.1501 Hi everyone,<br><br>Thanks Sarah for sending us the information.<br>As I won't be able to be part of the conference, would it be possible to get a summary of the conference content? That would be great!<br><br>Barbara sent us a message during the Christmas break saying that workgroups had been created early December and that a short paragraph presenting each workgroup would be sent to all CARE members.<br>In order to help Barbara and you for this task, may I suggest that each workgroup coordinator writes this paragraph, with focus on its goals and actions we want to undertake? What [...] Blackford, Sarah 2015-01-28T11:35:53+00:00 2015-01-28T11:35:53+00:00 conference directions https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CARE4PHD;a5655919.1501 Dear all,<br><br>Following a couple of enquiries about directions to Warwick University, the venue for the Career conference and guidance training in June, I thought I'd quickly send out some details to reassure its accessibility. The official directions are on the university website here:<br>http://www2.warwick.ac.uk/about/visiting/<br><br>Birmingham airport is the closest - the train line goes from there down to Coventry which is only about a 30 minute journey. From the station you can take a taxi or bus up to the campus. Alternatively, if you fly into London there is a regular direct train out of Euston station. [...] Blackford, Sarah 2015-01-28T10:02:59+00:00 2015-01-28T10:02:59+00:00 Supporting the Careers of PhD students and researchers - haring knowledge, practice and insights - 9th June 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CARE4PHD;b5fd1ae9.1501 Dear all,<br><br>I'm pleased to announce that CARE has got together with AGCAS (the Association of Graduate Careers Advisory Services in the UK) to organise a one-day conference for careers advisers and professionals who support the careers of PhD students and researchers. The initial outline and aims is on the AGCAS website as well as an outline of the preliminary programme.<br>http://agcas.org.uk/events/1081-Supporting-the-Careers-of-PhD-Students-and-Researchers-sharing-knowledge-practice-and-insights-Warwick- [...] Blackford, Sarah 2015-01-20T19:49:07+00:00 2015-01-20T19:49:07+00:00 Career guidance skills course - 10th June https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CARE4PHD;f50cdd7b.1501 Dear all,<br><br>As promised, AGCAS<http://www.agcas.org.uk/pages/about-us> is offering a one-day training course on career guidance skills on 10th June (the day after the Career conference) at Warwick University, UK. AGCAS already deliver this guidance course to careers advisers, but this new one will be tailored specifically for those who work with PhD students and postdocs. The main outcomes of the course (which will include the opportunity to practice on real PhD students and researchers!) will be the ability to: describe the skills that underpin guidance practice; apply these skills to short and long interventions; identify theories underpinning career choice; feel more [...] Tina Persson 2015-01-19T09:51:32+01:00 2015-01-19T09:51:32+01:00 Re: CARE update and Season's Wishes https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CARE4PHD;7663e99c.1501 Hi Everybody!<br><br>Firstly, I wish you a great start on 2015! And Barbara many thanks for the<br>great summary of Career Fairs!<br><br>My situation at the moment is that my position is running out at KI and I<br>am actively looking for a 50% position so I can relax a bit and get the<br>money in. Then I have started my own company My Headhunter&CareerCoach:-)<br>So, if you do not hear from me it is not because I am not interetsted, just<br>buissy getting the money in:-) I am also taking a Coach Certification and<br>my dream is to go [...] B\ufffd\ufffdr\ufffd\ufffdnice Kimpe 2015-01-18T22:36:20+01:00 2015-01-18T22:36:20+01:00 Re: CARE update and Season's Wishes https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CARE4PHD;abd36ded.1501 Hi everyone,<br><br>first of all, I want to wish you a very happy new year and many successes for your projects! I hope you had a good start in 2015 and I'm looking forward to seeing you soon.<br><br>Regarding career fairs, there is another one in Paris on Feb 12 "Paris Metropole pour l'emploi des jeunes".<br>In the specific corner for PhDs, ABG will have an exhibition booth and propose a career programme. It includes a professional pitch contest: PhDs are expected to present themselves in French (who they are, what they dream of doing...) in front of professionals and [...] Jasmien Van Daele 2014-12-23T15:47:15+01:00 2014-12-23T15:47:15+01:00 Re: CARE update and Season's Wishes https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CARE4PHD;28dc50ba.1412 Dear Sarah,<br><br>Many thanks for the update!<br><br>It is possible that in the first week of June I will be in Barcelona, so I cannot confirm that I will be able to come to Warwick. I will let you know.<br><br>As for European career fairs: Ghent University organizes each year a big Job Market for Young Researchers. In 2015 this will be organized on 31 March: http://afstudeerbeurs.augent.be/en/phd-students [...] Janssens, Barbara 2014-12-19T19:28:06+01:00 2014-12-19T19:28:06+01:00 CARE update and Season's Wishes https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CARE4PHD;298a5742.1412 Dear CARE colleagues,<br><br>Welcome on the JISCMAIL list on which we can now share information and send files. Persons wanting to join can send a request to CARE4PHD-request@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<mailto:CARE4PHD-request@JISCMAIL.AC.UK>.<br><br>On December 4 we came together with 6 CARE members (Tina, Anethe, Berenice, Alysia, Sarah and Barbara) and we would like to briefly let you know what we discussed. [...]
